name: Finite Earth
description:
Finite earth - build and expand the earth to protect the planet from astroids. a 360 tower defense ish game!

Goal: Build different machines to gain resources and don’t let Earth die, and protect it from incoming asteroids by building Laser Turrets. You have 30 seconds before asteroids come! Game over when one of the resources reach 0. Be careful! There is no ending just try to survive as long as you can until you get bored :p Good luck!

Tips:

-Game is paused while in the shop, so you dont gaing materials while in shop, and asteroids don’t come, so take your time!

-You lose materials passively by time and if asteroids hit earth!

Known Bugs (We plan to polish and further develop the game in the future)

-You can buy from the shop even though you don’t have enough materials, so before buying look at your materials.

-Asteroids should spawn more and more you play the game, but its all the same!

-Music changes when game goes out of focus.

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Place Building

Middle Mouse Button - Cancel Building

Right Mouse Button - Rotate Earth

Art by Kkochmal: https://www.instagram.com/kkochmal893/

This was our first Ludum Dare, I hope you enjoy this quirky little game ^.^
